column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Great Brunch yesterday! The food was great and the DJ that flew in from Caly made the experience much more - he brought a different vibe to Houston and Bosscat. I will definitely be back. My Sazerac was excellent
column2: I was our waiter wasn't familiar with this classic drink. Highly recommend adding it to the menu considering the speciality is whiskey
